phrases: I can walk on my own two feet here!
I command you in the name of royal Versian blood!
Not only have you survived, you have assumed command of our world.
I am proud of you, Asseylum.
You seem to have grown stronger.
People tend to change as they gain experience.
From the red sands of our home, I pray for your success in battle.
Trident Base, this is Capt. Magbaredge of the Deucalion.
Course, Trident Base docking bay, pier 12.
So that is the ship with the Martian tech...
I hear she is crewed by children who are not even old enough for the reserves.
What is the world coming to?
They must have scrounged up every squad capable of making it here.
Because this is going to be a massive operation.
We are now at a stop relative to pier 12.
Once mooring is complete, begin inspections and resupplying.
It still hurts a little, though.
I feel better when I take them,
but it degrades the sensitivity of the neural link.
It looks like an ordinary eye to me.
It is a developmental prototype, so the code needs to be improved,
but I can make out most things.
Have you gained a little weight?
I used 3D measurements to calculate the change in momentum
when you caught that 200g pack and worked out your total mass.
I subtracted the estimated weight of your uniform from that.
I have more muscle mass from exercising, that is all.
I can see stress in the formant analysis of your voice.
Are you sure it is not broken?
I can see identical stress patterns in her voice.
I, Vers Empire Princess Royal Asseylum Vers Allusia...
If that is a lie, it means...
she is not really the princess.
This part's waveform is definitely a lie.
I have not been stress eating!
I am not talking to you ever again!
I thought it would be easy to read Inko.
You really are an idiot, are not you?
Eddelrittuo, should not you be with Princess Lemrina?
We spotted that ship you told us about.
It looks like they were secretly repairing it.
Reports say it defeated Baron Yacoym and came up into space.
We might be forced to fight them.
Do you suppose that would make Princess Asseylum sad?
I wonder when she will wake up...
We will see her smile again.
I have asked Asseylum to do what you wanted.
I once lied to him that she had been assassinated,
and now I am lying to him that she is alive...
What is your opinion of Vers as it is now?
It is not my place to offer an opinion on our sacred homeland.
I believe it is possible for our society,
to become prosperous by conquering Earth, making it a domain, and taking its resources.
That wealth is likely to find its way to only the upper classes
and will not improve the lives of the citizens in the slightest.
Those who possess Aldnoah control everything.
That is the problem in a nutshell.
We owe much to His Imperial Majesty for unearthing Aldnoah.
But it was a grave sin
to hoard that power and create a society where the powerful control all.
When we have achieved victory and seized the Earth, that red world will change.
We have finished its activation tests.
Once we have finished fine-tuning the sync between each unit, it will be combat-ready.
Stygis Squadron, prepare to move out!
Why have you deactivated the Tharsis?
The only one here who can forcibly deactivate Aldnoah is Your Highness.
Perhaps you should ask my sister?
It had always struck me as odd.
How could you, a Terran, operate the Tharsis?
I am sure she would be happy to know you still love her in spite of her condition.
Even though we share a father,
no one pays me any heed simply because we have different mothers.
That is not true at all.
We all admire you, Princess Lemrina.
It is not me that you admire, it is my activation factor.
Is not that exactly why you came to me?
Do you want me that badly?
Is Aldnoah so important to you?
When my scientist father died, I lost my one protector.
I became a servant of the Vers Orbital Knights.
I will not say that I understand your hardships.
But I, too, have known cruel treatment due to my birth.
I can understand your suffering, if only some small portion of it.
You do have my heartfelt admiration, Princess Lemrina.
I am proud that you are my master.
Everything that was yours, I will take on as my own.
We will soon enter Earth orbit.
We will perform an aerobrake maneuver,
slingshot around, and enter the Satellite Belt.
We will then make for Marineros Island.
As you are aware, the countless rocks that comprise the Satellite Belt
travel in an elliptical orbit around the Earth.
Trident Base is one of those rocks.
Now, this is the orbit of Marineros, the frontline base of the Mars Army.
The two will make a close approach in 72 hours' time.
The distance between them will be a mere 7km.
That is close enough to be seen with the naked eye.
For that reason, a large-scale battle is expected between our two bases.
we have gathered you here from both orbit and the surface
to assemble a powerful fighting force.
It is thought that the Mars Army will also amass their forces for an all-out offensive.
We have never fought a space battle of this scale since the war began.
We predict an increase in high-density rocks in the area at the time of the operation.
Do you think we can handle it?
As a result, long-range fire will be thrown off course.
But considering that it will be a first for the enemy, too,
Your chances of landing a hit will be low.
it is probably nothing to be scared about.
But this will hold true for the enemy, as well.
Be that as it may, it is still a subject for concern.
Judging from the Mars Army's fighting style to date,
they have a tendency to put more emphasis on offense than defense.
As such, there is a high probability of them mobilizing their base's mechanized units
If you let that endearing side show every day, you would be sure to get a date.
and engaging us in close-quarter combat.
A little something for the ride.
Stygis Platoon, show me what you are made of.
Intense heat signatures closing in from LEO at high speed!
They will pass within 2km of this base
on a trajectory that will take them to the Mars Army's Marineros Base!
Orders from HQ to intercept, madam!
Ships closing in at high speed.
They intend to launch a surprise attack prior to the all-out offensive.
And prep the ship for emergency launch!
It is also fully kitted out with a space loadout.
Are you sure you want to keep this gaudy color?
Give the word, and I will paint it.
It is supposed to attract attention.
Relative velocity with enemy units is 3kps.
They will pass by in a flash.
Meaning that their chances of attacking are slim.
Neither one of us will land a hit at this range.
Compensating for gravity gradient resulting from dense satellite clusters.
I will act as a decoy to draw their fire.
How did it move like that?
How are shots landing in this wind?
It is anticipating the rounds' trajectory.
I have been looking for you, Bat...
No, I guess you did a class change and are Gull now.
Enemy convoy is almost in effective firing range!
Continue firing until enemy is out of range!
The personal Kataphrakt of Orbital Knight Count Cruhteo.
Later owned by Count Saazbaum and piloted by a knight under his command.
Yes, that boy prefers to only pilot trainers.
